### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name STRING,
    email STRING,
    age INT,
    address STRING
);


CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    order_date DATE,
    total_amount FLOAT,
    products JSONB
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE customers SET name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
